title: Low priority queue bug
body: I've been place in low priority queue but after the 20mins go by the timer restarts so right now I'm at 55:20 queue time just because it keeps restarting does anyone know how to fix this

replies.body: Looks like you were able to get that last LPQ game played out finally, but if this ever happens again be sure to shoot me a screenshot showing where the timer reset! I should be able to help out after being able to see that it's resetting for sure ^_^

Im also having the same problem. ive had to restart my queue at least 6 times at this point for the timer to instantly reset again and go back 20 10 minutes and freeze IF it ends. 

Heres my screenshot: https://gyazo.com/a63256bca0be52a9c8c6bfb5bda245ab

note the time remaining vs the finding match.

No queue should take that long, even with low priority. I'd try the simplest approach first, and restart your client. That involves leaving queue, but after waiting for 55 minutes, it sounds like it's bugged to me, and it's unlikely that it's going to put you into a game at that point anyways.
